  index: "place",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      suggest: {
        type: "completion",
        contexts: [
          {
            name: "place_type",
            type: "category",
          },
          {
            name: "location",
            type: "geo",
            precision: 4,
          },
        ],
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
